Sentencas: We prepared Ce1-xPrxO2-delta and investigated its high temperature properties as a material for the composite active layer of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOK) cathode.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: We found that increasing the Pr concentration increases the total conductivity and oxygen vacancy concentration at high temperature, and this may lead to improvement of the cathodic reaction.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: When Ce1-xPrxO2-delta is heated, it expands significantly at a certain temperature (T-inf), and this expansion depends on the Ce1-xPrxO2-delta composition.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: The expansion is associated with an abrupt increase in the unit cell volume of the cubic structure.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: Abrupt increases in the total conductivity and oxygen vacancy concentration were also observed at T-inf.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: These results can be explained by oxygen vacancy and electron formation (n-type electronic conductivity increase) at T-inf and above T-inf.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: A sample with a Ce1-xPrxO2-delta composition where x = 1.0 has no such T-inf.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes

Sentencas: A composition near x = 1.0 for Ce1-xPrxO2-delta is favorable for the active layer material of an SOK cathode, because of the high conductivity and high concentration of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes
High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes
High temperature properties of Ce1-xPrxO2-δ as an active layer material for SOFC cathodes
